rows.label: qst502011_msg0001
rows.name:
That was close. I heard the sound
of this object starting up...

rows.label: qst502011_msg0002
rows.name:
But the sound disappeared
in an instant...

rows.label: qst502011_msg0003
rows.name: Could it be linked to lightning power?

rows.label: qst502011_msg0005
rows.name:
The lightning power stopped
instantly, so this object
couldn't activate.

rows.label: qst502011_msg0006
rows.name:
So, if we continuously supply
it with lightning power...

rows.label: qst502011_msg0008
rows.name:
But we still don't know what will
happen when it activates...

rows.label: qst502011_msg0009
rows.name:
It's too dangerous with all
the people around during the
day, so let's do it at night.

rows.label: qst502011_msg0010
rows.name:
Yeah, that's a good idea.
You guys understand, right?
